title: Dainty 925 Sterling Silver CZ Engravable Personalized Bar Necklace for Women, 22"
features: modern, designer-inspired necklace jewelry featuring a cz-accented horizontal straight bar pendant held on either ends by its delicate yet durable 925 sterling silver dainty rolo chain
exquisitely handcrafted with authentic 925 sterling silver in perfect polished finish and adorned with a single diamond-colored cubic zirconia stone
comes with free special gift packaging and free customization (for your choice of customized engraving, click on "Customize Now" on the upper-right hand side of the product page)
made in the USA yet offered at factory direct jewelry price
ships from the manufacturer directly to the customers (engraved products are nonreturnable)
description: This perfectly polished 925 sterling silver bar necklace is a solid, simple, and beautiful statement of simplicity, style, and balance. Not only that, you may take it to the next level of distinct style with a personalized custom engraved statement of your choice. Make any any outfit stand out with this luxurious piece of fine jewelry as this trendy necklace features a straight, horizontal bar pendant that dangles from either ends of its thin yet elegant 925 sterling silver rolo chain.
